title: PDF Generation with Headless Chrome
description: Use a headless Chrome instance to convert URLs or raw HTML into PDF documents via the api2pdf.com service.

steps.title: Configure API Key
steps.description: Get your API key from api2pdf.com and add it here. This key will be used for all subsequent API calls.

steps.title: Convert URL to PDF (GET)
steps.description: Provide a public URL to convert it into a PDF. This method uses a GET request with the API key in the query string.

steps.title: Convert URL to PDF (POST)
steps.description: Provide a public URL to convert it into a PDF. This method uses a POST request with the API key in the Authorization header.

steps.title: Convert HTML to PDF (POST)
steps.description: Provide raw HTML content to convert it into a PDF. This method uses a POST request with the API key in the Authorization header.
